FALSE TRADE DESCRIPTIONS
In April, Spoon Chan started to sell second-hand bags and clothes in which some of them have been marked up higher than the original price. Trying to deceive customers that the second-hand items are still new to use, Chan also claimed that she had only used the items for one to two times which were found out false.
Please note that the case has been reported to the Customs and Excise Department.




Despite claiming that she only used the bag twice, she was found to have worn the bag more than that, including a trip to Tokyo.



COPYING IDEAS FROM @PUMPKINJENN AND @TINAWZQ
Since 2018, Spoon Chan has been found stealing fashion and photography ideas from other local influencers, including Pumpkin Jenn (@pumpkinjenn) and Tina Wang (@tinawzq).
Fashion style

Birthday ideas



A BLACKLISTED ONLINE SELLER SINCE 2016
Spoon Chan has been blacklisted online for being a problematic seller since 2016.
http://pigwest.blogspot.com/2016/12/yahoo-xfacebookx-ig-2017.html?m=1


Every influencer who pays significant effort and genuine respect for originality is highly appreciated. However, under no circumstances are plagiarism and dishonesty acceptable.

乳癌同 estrogen 嘅攝取量有關，而豐胸藥含有estrogen ，真心唔明仲有啲咩可以討論 除非你覺得胸大比自己健康重要啦，如果第時有乳癌要切咗個胸仲慘

btw 真心胸大唔代表靚，而且呢啲嘢真係 genes 已經決定咗。因為個胸咁冇信心，俾你有大胸都唔會有自信嗰種靚。

Please note that the following accusations are based on facts, instead of untrue stories.

FALSE TRADE DESCRIPTIONS
In April, Spoon Chan started to sell second-hand bags and clothes in which some of them have been marked up higher than the original price. Trying to deceive customers that the second-hand items are still new to use, Chan also claimed that she had only used the items for one to two times which were found out false.
Please note that the case has been reported to the Customs and Excise Department.




Despite claiming that she only used the bag twice, she was found to have worn the bag more than that, including a trip to Tokyo.



COPYING IDEAS FROM @PUMPKINJENN AND @TINAWZQ
Since 2018, Spoon Chan has been found stealing fashion and photography ideas from other local influencers, including Pumpkin Jenn (@pumpkinjenn) and Tina Wang (@tinawzq).
